color.code:
const status = context.item.data?.['presence_status']?.trim()?.toLowerCase();

switch (status) {
  case 'present':             // #3CCB7F (light green)
    return '#065F46';         // dark green-800
  case 'absent_unexcused':    // #F87171 (light red)
    return '#7F1D1D';         // dark red-800
  case 'absent_excused':      // #FDBA74 (light orange)
    return '#78350F';         // dark orange-800
  case 'partial':             // #FCD34D (light yellow)
    return '#92400E';         // dark amber-800
  default:                    // #E2E8F0 (slate-200)
    return '#1E293B';         // dark slate-800
}

_ww-text_color.code:
const status = context.item.data?.['presence_status']?.trim()?.toLowerCase();

switch (status) {
  case 'present':             // #3CCB7F (light green)
    return '#065F46';         // dark green-800
  case 'absent_unexcused':    // #F87171 (light red)
    return '#7F1D1D';         // dark red-800
  case 'absent_excused':      // #FDBA74 (light orange)
    return '#78350F';         // dark orange-800
  case 'partial':             // #FCD34D (light yellow)
    return '#92400E';         // dark amber-800
  default:                    // #E2E8F0 (slate-200)
    return '#1E293B';         // dark slate-800
}

value.code: return context.component?.variables?.[/* Absence Start Date Picker - value */ '4b4f177b-f5e2-4218-8586-04e872ec22be-value']

return isRecurring ? variables['b6f40d10-857d-4735-9da0-3a4d34797b01'] : null;
